subject: Chicago Marathon
Marathon Running
Contests and Prizes
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Sammy Wanjiru of Kenya won the Chicago marathon with a time of 2 hours, 5 minutes and 41 seconds, setting a record for the fastest marathon on American soil.
snippet: Sammy Wanjiru of Kenya won the Chicago marathon with a time of 2 hours, 5 minutes and 41 seconds, setting a record for the fastest marathon on American soil.
